item.title: 白宫经济顾问：如果停摆持续下去，美国第四季度国内生产总值可能出现负增长
item.description: 白宫经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）在周日播出的一次访谈中表示，如果联邦关门持续下去，美国第四季度的经济增长可能会出现负增长。【原文：U.S. economic growth in the fourth quarter could be negative if a federal shutdown drags on, White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said in an interview that aired on Sunday.】

item.title: 万豪终止与住宿租赁公司 Sonder 的许可协议
item.description: 酒店运营商万豪国际集团周日表示，由于 Sonder 违约，其与住宿租赁公司 Sonder 的许可协议已被终止。【原文：Hotel operator Marriott International on Sunday said its licensing agreement with lodging rentals company Sonder has been terminated due to a default from Sonder.】

item.title: 布里克报道：瑞士商界领袖之行有助于美国贸易关系解冻
item.description: 据《Blick 报》周日报道，在商界领袖访问美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump），促成关系解冻之后，瑞士可能接近于赢得美国对其进口商品征收 39% 关税的喘息机会。【原文：Switzerland could be close to winning a respite from the 39% tariffs imposed by the United States on imports of its goods, newspaper Blick reported on Sunday, after a visit by business leaders to U.S. President Donald Trump helped thaw relations.】

item.title: 中国豁免 Nexperia 民用芯片出口禁令
item.description: 中国商务部周日表示，中国已对民用 Nexperia 芯片的出口管制给予豁免，此举将有助于缓解汽车制造商和汽车供应商的供应短缺问题。【原文：China has granted exemptions to export controls on Nexperia chips for civilian applications, the commerce ministry said on Sunday in a move that will help to relieve supply shortages for carmakers and automotive suppliers.】

item.title: 股市遭遇减速带，但投资者继续看涨
item.description: 股市近期的疲软标志着推动股市创下一系列历史新高的反弹中的一个减速带，但许多投资者认为回调只是一个喘息的机会，而不是更深麻烦的征兆。【原文：The stock market's recent weakness marked a speed bump in a rally that had driven stocks to a series of record highs, but many investors view the pullback as a breather rather than a sign of deeper trouble.】

item.title: 美国航空公司为政府规定的第三天航班削减做准备
item.description: 继上周六空中交通管制人员短缺导致数千航班受阻后，各大航空公司周日又开始了第三天政府规定的航班削减。【原文：Major airlines braced for a third day of government-mandated flight cuts Sunday after rising air traffic control staffing shortages snarled thousands of flights on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国暂停禁止向美国出口镓、锗和锑
item.description: 中国商务部周日表示，中国已暂停批准向美国出口与镓、锗、锑和超硬材料有关的 "军民两用产品"。【原文：China has suspended a ban on approving exports of "dual-use items" related to gallium, germanium, antimony and super-hard materials to the U.S., the commerce ministry said on Sunday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，威士卡和万事达卡即将与商家达成和解，将降低收费标准
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六援引知情人士的话报道，美国支付公司威士（Visa）和万事达（Mastercard）即将与商家达成一项和解协议，旨在通过降低商店支付的费用，并赋予商家更多拒绝某些信用卡的权力，从而结束长达 20 年的法律纠纷。【原文：U.S. payment firms Visa and Mastercard are nearing a settlement with merchants that aims to end a 20-year-old legal dispute by lowering fees stores pay and giving them more power to reject certain credit cards, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局在 UPS 飞机坠毁后禁止 MD-11 航班飞行
item.description: 本周早些时候，UPS一架MD-11货运飞机在肯塔基州坠毁，造成至少14人死亡，美国联邦航空管理局周六表示，暂时禁止MD-11飞机飞行，等待检查。【原文：The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration on Saturday said it was prohibiting MD-11 planes from flying for now, pending inspections, after a crash earlier in the week of a UPS MD-11 cargo freighter killed at least 14 people in Kentucky.】

item.title: 意大利银行支持数字欧元，但希望将成本分摊到时间上
item.description: 意大利银行业协会（ABI）的一位高级官员表示，意大利银行支持欧洲中央银行的数字欧元项目，但希望银行为实施该项目所需的投资能在一段时间内错开，因为成本很高。【原文：Italian banks support the European Central Bank's digital euro project but want investments required by them to implement it to be staggered over time because the costs are high, a top official of the Italian Banking Association (ABI) said.】

item.title: 大型零售商承诺感恩节更便宜，但也有变数
item.description: 食品杂货巨头沃尔玛、塔吉特（Target）和阿尔迪（Aldi）大肆宣传他们的感恩节大餐比以往任何时候都更实惠。但是，这些零售商的做法与购物者的做法如出一辙，他们会选择更便宜的自有品牌替代品，或者提供更少的商品。【原文：Grocery giants Walmart, Target and Aldi are trumpeting their Thanksgiving meal deals as more affordable than ever. But those retailers are doing exactly what shoppers are doing, trading down to cheaper private-label alternatives or offering fewer items.】

item.title: 停摆持续第二天，美国遭遇航班削减
item.description: 周六，美国航空公司和旅客艰难地度过了全国航班削减的第二天，因为政府关门预计将在未来几天导致更多航班取消。【原文：U.S. airlines and travelers slogged through a second day of flight cuts across the country on Saturday as the government shutdown was expected to drive more cancellations in the days to come.】

item.title: 联邦停摆威胁这些特朗普选民的生计，但不影响他们的政治忠诚
item.description: 从联邦工资到公共福利，美国政府史上最长的停摆切断了数百万美国人的生命线，其中许多人投票支持唐纳德-特朗普总统。【原文：From federal paychecks to public benefits, the longest U.S. government shutdown in history is cutting lifelines for millions of Americans, many of whom voted for President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 路易斯维尔坠机事件后，UPS停用 MD-11 机队
item.description: UPS 周五表示，它已经停飞了其麦道 MD-11 机队，该机型卷入了周二在肯塔基州路易斯维尔发生的空难，造成至少 13 人死亡。【原文：UPS on Friday said it has grounded its fleet of McDonnell Douglas MD-11s, the type of plane involved in Tuesday's crash in Louisville, Kentucky, which killed at least 13 people.】

item.title: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋认为对 Blackwell 芯片的需求强劲
item.description: Nvidia 首席执行官黄仁勋周六表示，随着该公司对台积电（TSMC）晶圆的需求增加，半导体巨头对其最先进的 Blackwell 芯片的需求 "非常强劲"。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang on Saturday said the semiconductor giant is experiencing "very strong demand" for its state-of-the-art Blackwell chips, as its appetite for wafers from TSMC grows.】

item.title: 麻省理工学院毕业的兄弟被控抢劫 2500 万美元加密货币，宣布审判无效
item.description: 周五，一名联邦法官宣布，两名在麻省理工学院（Massachusetts Institute of Technology）接受过教育的兄弟被控在 12 秒内窃取价值 2,500 万美元的加密货币的新奇计划无效，检察官称他们利用了以太坊区块链的完整性。【原文：A federal judge on Friday declared a mistrial in the case of two Massachusetts Institute of Technology-educated brothers charged with carrying out a novel scheme to steal $25 million worth of cryptocurrency in 12 seconds that prosecutors said exploited the Ethereum blockchain's integrity.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，辉瑞在与诺和诺德的竞购战中提高了对美塞拉的报价
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，辉瑞公司已向肥胖症药物开发商 Metsera 公司提交了一份甜美的竞购方案，因为辉瑞与竞争对手诺和诺德公司的斗争正在升级。【原文：Pfizer has submitted a sweetened bid for obesity drug developer Metsera , as its fight against rival Novo Nordisk escalates, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 由于出货停滞，Qcells 在美国太阳能工厂解雇 1000 名工人
item.description: 韩国韩华集团（Hanwha）在美国的太阳能制造部门 Qcells 表示，由于从海外运来的零部件经常被美国海关官员拖延，该公司将解雇佐治亚州工厂的 1000 名工人。【原文：Qcells, the U.S. solar manufacturing arm of Korea's Hanwha , said it would furlough 1,000 workers at its Georgia factories because shipments of components it needs from overseas are being routinely stalled by U.S. customs officials.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，贝莱德将清盘投资于倒闭汽车贷款公司 Tricolor 的基金
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引几位熟知这一决定的人士的话报道称，全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）正在关闭一个社会影响基金，该基金曾投资于倒闭的次级汽车贷款公司 Tricolor。【原文：BlackRock , the world's biggest asset manager, is winding down a social impact fund that invested in collapsed subprime car lender Tricolor, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing several people familiar with the decision.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 Altman 敦促美国扩大《芯片法》的税收抵免，促进人工智能发展
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周五加倍努力，要求美国扩大《芯片法案》税收抵免的资格，因为美国正在加快努力，以确保其作为全球人工智能领导者的地位。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on Friday doubled down on the company's ask for the U.S. to expand eligibility for a Chips Act tax credit, as the country accelerates efforts to secure its position as a global leader in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 阿根廷 YPF 公司第三季度因税费支出而出现净亏损
item.description: 阿根廷国有控股能源公司 YPF 周五表示，该公司第三季度净亏损达 1.98 亿美元，亏损原因是 YPF 的所得税费用（特别是递延税费）大幅增加。【原文：Argentina's state-controlled energy company YPF swung to a net loss of $198 million in the third quarter , the company said on Friday, crediting the loss to a sharp increase in YPF's income tax expense, specifically a deferred tax charge.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Rivian 为首席执行官提供了马斯克式的薪酬福利，价值高达 46 亿美元
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Rivian 周五表示，该公司正在修订其首席执行官的薪酬方案，未来十年的总价值将高达 46 亿美元，该方案效仿了竞争对手特斯拉（Tesla）向首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）支付薪酬的计划，并与新的利润目标和股价下调里程碑挂钩。【原文：EV maker Rivian on Friday said it was giving its CEO a revised pay package worth as much as $4.6 billion over the next decade, a deal modeled on larger rival Tesla's plan for paying CEO Elon Musk, and linked to new profit targets and reduced share price milestones.】

item.title: 美联储最新调查显示，政策不确定性和地缘政治风险是最令人担忧的稳定性问题
item.description: 在美联储周五公布的一项最新调查中，政策不确定性（包括全球贸易和央行独立性）以及整体地缘政治风险在金融稳定性问题中名列榜首。【原文：Policy uncertainty, including on global trade and central bank independence, and overall geopolitical risk topped the list of financial stability concerns in a new Federal Reserve survey released on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普称要求司法部调查肉类包装公司抬高牛肉价格的行为
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他已要求司法部调查肉类包装公司，因为他认为这些公司推高了牛肉的价格。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that he has asked the Justice Department to investigate meat packing companies that he says are driving up the price of beef.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，银行为甲骨文数据中心项目贷款 180 亿美元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，一个由约 20 家银行组成的财团将提供约 180 亿美元的项目融资贷款，以支持在新墨西哥州建设一个与甲骨文公司有关的数据中心园区。【原文：A consortium of around 20 banks is providing a project finance loan of about $18 billion to support the construction of a data center campus linked to Oracle in New Mexico, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰：稳定币的采用可能会给利率带来下行压力
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）周五表示，如果稳定币最终得到广泛应用，这可能意味着央行需要将短期利率维持在比原来更低的水平。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran on Friday said that if stablecoins end up enjoying widespread adoption it could mean the central bank needs to keep short-term interest rates lower than they would otherwise be.】

item.title: 法国在收回所有非法产品后允许 Shein 恢复运营
item.description: 法国财政部周五允许中国在线零售商申银万国从其平台上撤下所有非法产品后，恢复在法国的运营。【原文：The French Finance Ministry on Friday allowed Chinese online retailer Shein to resume operating in France after demonstrating it had withdrawn all illicit products from its platforms.】

item.title: GoDaddy 因网页设计技术专利被判赔 1.7 亿美元
item.description: 特拉华州联邦陪审团在周五公布的一项判决中称，互联网域名注册商 GoDaddy 因侵犯一家专利所有人的网站建设技术权利而欠其 1.7 亿美元。【原文：Internet domain registrar GoDaddy owes a patent owner $170 million for violating its rights in website-building technology, a Delaware federal jury said in a verdict made public on Friday.】

item.title: 大众汽车称已恢复 Nexperia 芯片供应
item.description: 德国日报《Handelsblatt》援引大众汽车中国区负责人的话报道，欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车已收到中国半导体制造商耐克森公司在供应中断后交付的首批芯片。【原文：Volkswagen , Europe's biggest carmaker, has received its first deliveries of chips from Chinese-owned semiconductor manufacturer Nexperia following a supply outage, its China chief was cited as saying by German daily Handelsblatt.】

item.title: 贝克休斯称美国钻井商四周内第三次增加油气钻机
item.description: 能源服务公司贝克休斯（Baker Hughes）周五在其密切关注的报告中称，本周美国能源公司在四周内第三次增加了石油和天然气钻机。【原文：U.S. energy firms this week added oil and natural gas rigs for the third time in four weeks, energy services firm Baker Hughes said in its closely followed report on Friday.】
